factual: What penalties are imposed on individuals who allow another entity to bury or dump hazardous wastes listed in Appendix A of the Stockholm Convention beyond permissible limits?
scenario_based: If a company owner permits someone else to dispose of between 3,000 kg and under 5,000 kg of persistent organic pollutants illegally, what legal consequences might they face according to this regulation?
